subject: Baseball
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: Johnny Cueto, a right-handed starter who was 12-7 last season with a 3.64 earned run average, completed a four-year, $27 million contract with the Reds that allows Cincinnati to avoid arbitration.
snippet: Johnny Cueto, a right-handed starter who was 12-7 last season with a 3.64 earned run average, completed a four-year, $27 million contract with the Reds that allows Cincinnati to avoid arbitration.
